feed.title: FX::SCP
feed.subtitle: Website for the new program FX::SCP

entry.title: Welcome to FX::SCP!
entry.content:
Well, the FX::SCP project has been officially started, and the proof of it is right here (or the FX::SCP Code might be better). A webpage for a program from Inspyre Technologies. That kind of dedication deserves some brownies…. brb!

PS. While I go make brownies check out the FX::SCP Help page.
entry.summary: Well, the FX::SCP project has been officially started, and the proof of it is right here (or the FX::SCP Code might be better). A webpage for a program from Inspyre Technologies. That kind of dedication deserves some brownies…. brb!
